title: Donovan's Vision Blog
description: Learning how to build apps for the Apple Vision Pro.

items.title: This is my first post.
items.content_html:
This is a test post while I get things started on this little site about Apple Vision Pro!

I'm looking forward to learning how this new tech will work, as well as building apps for it in SwiftUI.

This blog is built on Eleventy Base Blog with a few small tweaks.

Thanks for reading, be sure to check out the RSS feed.
